heroSection.title: About Alumni Portal
heroSection.subtitle: Connecting Alumni, Building Networks, Creating Opportunities
heroSection.description: A comprehensive platform designed to strengthen the bond between our institution and its alumni, fostering lifelong connections and professional growth.

aboutProject.title: About the Project
aboutProject.description: The Alumni Portal is a modern, comprehensive platform designed to bridge the gap between our institution and its distinguished alumni community. This project aims to create a vibrant ecosystem where former students can reconnect, share experiences, and contribute to the growth of current students.

features.title: Alumni Directory
features.description: Comprehensive search and filter system to find and connect with fellow alumni

features.title: Interactive Dashboard
features.description: Personalized dashboard with news, events, and networking opportunities

features.title: Real-time Communication
features.description: Chat system and notifications to keep the community connected

features.title: Career Opportunities
features.description: Job postings and mentorship programs for career advancement

features.title: Success Stories
features.description: Platform to share achievements and inspire fellow alumni

aboutInstitution.title: Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya, Chittorgarh
aboutInstitution.fullName: Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya, Mandaphia, Chittorgarh, Rajasthan
aboutInstitution.description: Welcome to our dream come true – Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya, Chittorgarh (Raj). Situated at Mandaphia, 40 km from the district headquarters, it is one of the premier integrated schools under the unique Navodaya Vidyalaya System, which provides quality education to talented students from rural areas.
aboutInstitution.history: Established in 1987 as part of the National Policy on Education – 1986, JNV Chittorgarh was founded with the aim of identifying and nurturing rural talent. Since then, it has grown into a center of academic excellence and holistic development.
aboutInstitution.vision: To bring out the best in rural children through modern, value-based, and holistic education in a residential environment.
aboutInstitution.mission: To provide quality education to talented students, predominantly from rural areas, and enable them to meet the challenges of the modern world while retaining their cultural roots.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: Achieving the highest standards in academic and co-curricular pursuits

values.title: Discipline
values.description: Fostering a structured and respectful learning environment

values.title: Integrity
values.description: Promoting honesty, transparency, and moral strength

values.title: Empowerment
values.description: Encouraging self-reliance and leadership in every student

values.title: Inclusivity
values.description: Providing equal opportunities to all, regardless of background

achievements: Established in 1987 under Navodaya Vidyalaya Samiti
Focus on rural student excellence in academics and co-curricular activities
100% pass rate in CBSE Class XII board exams for three consecutive years (2021–2023)
100% pass rate in CBSE Class X board exams for three consecutive years (2021–2023)

aboutDevelopers.title: Meet the Development Team
aboutDevelopers.description: This alumni portal is crafted with passion and dedication by a team of talented developers who believe in the power of technology to connect people and create meaningful experiences.

team.name: Sumit Dhaker
team.description: Man behind the project, specializing in full-stack development and the creation of innovative web applications which we are using here.
team.quote: One man army behind this project.

team.name: Tanisha Patidar
team.description: UI/UX design, database management, and API integration, ensuring the portal runs smoothly and efficiently.
team.quote: Ensuring the portal runs smoothly and efficiently.

developmentProcess.description: Comprehensive requirement analysis and UI/UX design
Building responsive and interactive user interfaces
Creating robust APIs and database architecture
Connecting all components and thorough testing

testimonials.name: Dr. R.K. Rawal
testimonials.message: The JNV MAA portal is a visionary step that has made alumni interaction more meaningful. It's a bridge between our past and future.

testimonials.name: Suman Sharma
testimonials.message: Engagement has multiplied thanks to this platform. It’s now easier to organize events and keep alumni updated.

testimonials.name: Amit Joshi
testimonials.message: JNV MAA keeps me connected with my roots. I feel proud to see the institution evolve and stay connected with us.

contactInfo.title: Get in Touch
contactInfo.description: Have questions about the portal or want to contribute? We'd love to hear from you!
